long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TrimURL.app is a powerful yet simple URL shortening tool designed to help you shorten long web links and generate QR codes instantly. Whether you're sharing links via social media, emails, or print, TrimURL.app offers customizable features that make managing your URLs quick and easy.

Key Features:

1 .Instant URL Shortening: Quickly convert long URLs into compact, shareable links.
2. QR Code Generation: Automatically create QR codes for your shortened URLs.
3. One-Click Copy: Copy the shortened URL with a single click for easy sharing.
4. Recent History: View and manage recently shortened URLs for convenience.
5. Secure: All URLs are shortened using secure (HTTPS) connections.
6. Efficient: Fast URL processing with minimal load times.

This extension is perfect for anyone looking for a quick, reliable solution for managing and shortening URLs. Itâ€™s user-friendly, efficient, and packed with essential features to optimize your experience.
